title: What can molecular assembly learn from catalysed assembly in living organisms?
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,1892-1914
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00634D, Review Article
Zhi-Chao Lei, Xinchang Wang, Liulin Yang, Hang Qu, Yibin Sun, Yang Yang, Wei Li, Wen-Bin Zhang, Xiao-Yu Cao, Chunhai Fan, Guohong Li, Jiarui Wu, Zhong-Qun Tian
We discuss how living organisms utilize the catalysed assembly (catassembly) way to construct and control complex assembly systems with high efficiency and selectivity, and how we can harness catassembly to design functional molecular assemblies.
